Liberate the Web/Finance

Defends your right to stay anonymous

All donations are accepting in cryptocurrencies Bitcoin and Litecoin. All other currencies available by exchange service and convert to Bitcoin instantly. Transaction history in cryptocurrencies is open. You can check all transactions here and here. That page will contain our costs.
